PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-13382017-11-02,  ,  ,  ,  AAFC
ActFarm Income Protection Act
SubjectFinancial Assistance under the federal-provincial-territorial AgriRecovery Framework to Quebec agricultural producers ** Agreement **
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada to ENTER INTO AN AGREEMENT with the province of QUEBEC to provide federal contributions of up to $7.8 million under the Agricultural Disaster Relief Program (AgriRecovery) to assist affected agricultural producers with the extraordinary costs related to hail storms in 2017.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
